fields.description:
Enhance TDoc2 tools to support the following functionality.

- Enhance documentation generators
- Support Code Snippets
- Support Modules
- Support Localization
fields.summary: Tooling: As a Ti documentation writer, I would like to have access to enhanced TDoc tools

comments.body: Estimated effort is only for the tickets needed for 2.0 release.
This story has a number of tickets that are not targeted for 2.0 or even 2.5 release. We need to pull the specific TIDOC tickets in the sprint.
